Key Match Events: Bhanuka Rajapaksa scored 31 runs off 14 balls with four fours and one six.
Sri Lanka beat Afghanistan by four wickets in the Super Four match of Asia Cup 2022.
Rajapaksa and Danushka Gunathilaka stitched together a 32-run partnership.
Gunathilaka scored 33 runs before being dismissed by Rashid Khan.
Sri Lanka chased down 176 with 5 balls to spare.
Openers Kusal Mendis and Pathum Nissanka put on 62 runs for the opening wicket off 6.3 overs.
Post-Match Reflections: Bhanuka Rajapaksa expressed that Sri Lanka wanted to make a comeback after being bowled out for 105 against Afghanistan in a previous match.
Rajapaksa mentioned his role in the team and the strategy to strengthen the middle order.
